text:
Hi Andrew, i did some debugging and found that the annotations dictionary looks like this when using just `account`
```{'account': Concat(ConcatPair(F(usage_account_id), Value())),
 'cost_units': Coalesce(F(currency_code), Value(USD)),
 'date': TruncDayString(F(usage_start))}```

text: So `if q_param in self.parameters.get('group_by', {}).keys()` requires that the group by be exactly equal to the q_param (which is account in this case) when it should match `and:account` and `or:account` as well.

elements.text: So
if q_param in self.parameters.get('group_by', {}).keys()
requires that the group by be exactly equal to the q_param (which is account in this case) when it should match
and:account
and
or:account
as well.
